thread.title: East Baton Rouge spending rises 1.2 percent in August
thread.title_full: East Baton Rouge spending rises 1.2 percent in August - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: East Baton Rouge spending rises 1.2 percent in August
text:
BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) - Consumer and business spending in East Baton Rouge Parish rose by 1.2 percent in August, the third month in a row where economic activity was higher than the year before.
According to figures released Wednesday by the city-parish Finance Department, businesses and consumers spent $683.3 million in August. That compares with $675.1 million in August 2014. The figures do not include vehicle sales, which are generally examined separately when looking at spending as an economic indicator.
The Advocate reports ( http://bit.ly/1LHs2FP ) spending outside the city limits, which includes big-box retailers, was down 0.2 percent in August to nearly $292.1 million.
Vehicle sales were up 5.4 percent from the year before, reaching nearly $67.3 million for August.
Information from: The Advocate, http://theadvocate.com
